scripts.build: rollup src/index.js -f iife --globals Ramda:R | babel --presets es2015 | uglifyjs -m -c > app.min.js
scripts.start: npm run watch & harp server & browser-sync start --proxy 'localhost:9000' --files index.jade app.min.js
scripts.publish: trash www && npm run build && harp compile && cd www && surge
